info.author: Caroline Friedel
info.description: Calculates readthrough and readin values and optionally downstream FPKM and expression in dOCR regions
info.paperDescription: Read-through was calculated as previously described in Hennig T et al, 2028, PLOS Pathogens 14(3): e1006954
info.dependencies: Apache Commons CLI library (jar included with module)

param.name: readthroughLength
param.description: [optional] length of downstream window in which read-through is calculated

param.name: readinLength
param.description: [optional] length of upstream window in which read-in is calculated

param.name: strandedness
param.description: strandedness: 0=not strandspecific, 1=first read indicates strand, 2=second read indicates strand

param.name: overlap
param.description: [optional] minimum overlap of read to be counted for read-through/in window

param.name: idxstats
param.description: [optional] idxstats file with numbers of mapped reads per chromosome, necessary for calculating downstream FPKM and transcription in dOCR regions

param.name: normFactor
param.description: [optional] factor for normalizing by mapped reads and gene length for downstream FPKM calculation

param.name: exclude
param.description: [optional] chromosomes to exclude from calculating total mapped reads, separated by ,

param.name: windowLength
param.description: [optional] number of steps for evaluating transcription on dOCRs
